question: Which of the following is true about China’s BeiDou Navigation Satellite System? 1.The positioning accuracy of the system has reached 10 meters globally and five meters in the Asia-Pacific region. 2.North Korea has become the first country to use the BeiDou system. 3.It is the fourth global satellite navigation system after the US GPS, Russia’s GLONASS and the European Union’s Galileo.
explanation: China’s BeiDou Navigation Satellite System (BDS) is considered to rival the widely-used American GPS. Pakistan has become the first country to use the BeiDou system ending its reliance on the Global Positioning System .The BeiDou system started serving China in 2000 and the Asia- Pacific region in 2012.
